content.query:
-- Create the stored proc to bring in the data daily to the DW internal tables for reporting.

-- Create schemas
create schema staging;
go
create schema dw;
go




-- Create tables
CREATE TABLE [staging].[game-01]
( 
	[ISO8601] [varchar](20)  NULL,
	[location] [varchar](20)  NULL,
	[net_ping] [float]  NULL,
	[refresh_rate] [float]  NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	HEAP
)
GO
CREATE TABLE [dw].[games]
( 
	[ISO8601] [varchar](20)  NULL,
	[location] [varchar](20)  NULL,
	[net_ping] [float]  NULL,
	[refresh_rate] [float]  NULL
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = HASH ( [location] ),
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO




-- Create Stored Proc
CREATE PROC [dbo].[sp_dwInsert] AS
BEGIN
    -- Truncate the staging table. Staging table will only hold new records to be inserted
    truncate table staging.[game-01];

    -- Insert only new records into the staging table
    insert into staging.[game-01]
    select
         e.ISO8601
        ,e.location
        ,e.net_ping
        ,e.refresh_rate
    from dbo.game01daily as e
    left join dw.games as s
    on 
        e.ISO8601 = s.ISO8601
    --    and e.deviceid = s.deviceid
    --    and e.avg_temperature = s.avg_temperature
    --    and e.avg_humidity = e.avg_humidity
    where s.ISO8601 is null

    -- Insert new records into the DW table
    insert into dw.games select * from staging.[game-01];
END
GO
